name: Swipe2 Prototype
description:
Swipe to make your way until the very end of the stage and use the music to help you sync your movements!

IMPORTANT:  For this build, you can only swipe up, down, left and right, without using diagonals. I would love to know if you think that this adds to the challenge or you believe this should be changed.

Contact information: matheus.allmeida@outlook.com.br
